about-project-page.head-title: Sergey Didenko blog - About My Blog project
about-project-page.title: About My Blog project
about-project-page.ul-title: The project was created to solve several problems:
about-project-page.li-2: Develop a convenient and flexible blog using the latest technology
about-project-page.li-3: To consolidate knowledge in the development and try new solutions
about-project-page.li-4: To consolidate knowledge in project management
about-project-page.li-5:
Educational material for novice programmers, as the project is developed "from scratch".
The development process is as close as possible to the workflow,
and therefore I hope it will be useful to someone.
about-project-page.languages: Java, TypeScript, HTML, SCSS, JSON, MySql.
about-project-page.technologies: Angular, Webpack, Spring REST, Spring JPA, Security.
about-project-page.follow:
Also you can follow my Git account https://git.sergey-didenko.pro
to get the latest updates.
